016package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.entity;
017
018import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
019import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
020import androidx.room.ColumnInfo;
021import androidx.room.Entity;
022import androidx.room.Index;
023import androidx.room.PrimaryKey;
024import com.google.gson.annotations.Expose;
025import java.time.Instant;
026
027/**
028 * Encapsulates the data elements maintained for a signed-in user in the app's Room/SQLite-based
029 * persistent data store.
030 */
031@SuppressWarnings("unused")
032@Entity(
033    tableName = "user",
034    indices = {
035        @Index(value = "oauth_key", unique = true),
036        @Index(value = "display_name", unique = true)
037    }
038)
039public class User {
040
041  @PrimaryKey(autoGenerate = true)
042  @ColumnInfo(name = "user_id")
043  private long id;
044
045  @Expose
046  private String key;
047
048  @NonNull
049  private Instant created = Instant.MIN;
050
051  @ColumnInfo(name = "oauth_key")
052  @NonNull
053  private String oauthKey = "";
054
055  @ColumnInfo(name = "display_name", collate = ColumnInfo.NOCASE)
056  @NonNull
057  @Expose
058  private String displayName = "";
059
060  /**
061   * Returns the auto-generated unique identifier of this instance.
062   */
063  public long getId() {
064    return id;
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Sets the unique identifier of this instance.
069   *
070   * @param id
071   */
072  @SuppressWarnings("JavadocDeclaration")
073  public void setId(long id) {
074    this.id = id;
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Returns the unique key of this instance. This key is what we will send to and from the server.
079   */
080  public String getKey() {
081    return key;
082  }
083
084  /**
085   * Sets the unique key of this instance. This key is what we will send to and from the server.
086   *
087   * @param key
088   */
089  public void setKey(String key) {
090    this.key = key;
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Returns the timestamp of the INSERT of this user in the database.
095   */
096  @NonNull
097  public Instant getCreated() {
098    return created;
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Sets the INSERT timestamp of this user. This method should be invoked just prior to INSERT.
103   *
104   * @param created
105   */
106  @SuppressWarnings("JavadocDeclaration")
107  public void setCreated(@NonNull Instant created) {
108    this.created = created;
109  }
110
111  /**
112   * Returns the fixed OAuth2.0 identifier (aka <em>subject</em>) of this user.
113   */
114  @NonNull
115  public String getOauthKey() {
116    return oauthKey;
117  }
118
119  /**
120   * Sets the fixed OAuth2.0 identifier (aka <em>subject</em>) of this user.
121   *
122   * @param oauthKey
123   */
124  @SuppressWarnings("JavadocDeclaration")
125  public void setOauthKey(@NonNull String oauthKey) {
126    this.oauthKey = oauthKey;
127  }
128
129  /**
130   * Returns unique display name of this user.
131   */
132  @NonNull
133  public String getDisplayName() {
134    return displayName;
135  }
136
137  /**
138   * Sets unique display name of this user.
139   *
140   * @param displayName
141   */
142  @SuppressWarnings("JavadocDeclaration")
143  public void setDisplayName(@NonNull String displayName) {
144    this.displayName = displayName;
145  }
146
147  /**
148   * Computes and returns the {@code int}-valued hash code of this instance. Currently, this
149   * computation is based only on the primary key value.
150   */
151  @Override
152  public int hashCode() {
153    return Long.hashCode(id);
154  }
155
156  /**
157   * Compares this instance to {@code obj} for equality and returns a {@code boolean} result.
158   * Currently, this comparison is based only on the type of {@code obj}, and (if
159   * {@code obj instanceof User}) the primary key values of {@code this} and {@code (User) obj}: two
160   * instances of {@link User} are considered equal if and only if their {@code id} field values are
161   * equal and non-zero.
162   *
163   * @param obj Object to compared to {@code this}.
164   * @return {@code true} if {@code this} and {@code obj} should be considered equal; {@code false}
165   * otherwise.
166   */
167  @Override
168  public boolean equals(@Nullable Object obj) {
169    boolean matched;
170    if (obj == this) {
171      matched = true;
172    } else if (obj instanceof User other) {
173      if (id != 0 && other.id != 0 && id == other.id) {
174        matched = true;
175      } else {
176        matched = (oauthKey.equals(other.oauthKey));
177      }
178
179    } else {
180      matched = false;
181    }
182    return matched;
183  }
184
185}
186
187// Everyone asks what is the user, but no one asks HOW is the user...
